posts.post_title: T206 Murphy Throwing Horizontal For Trade
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Rick McQuillan
Hi, 
I have a nice Murphy Throwing that I would like to trade for a similar condition card of any of the following T206's:

Pelty horizontal

Reulbach glove showing

F Smith Chicago & Boston

F Smith Chicago White Cap

Thanks,
Rick
